Package astar.pathfinder

Class Summary
Astar Abstract implementation of the A* algorithm, a subclass needs to implement the estimateDistance() function for this algorithm to work.
AstarFactory Factory to get instance of Astar algorithm
DiagonalMethod The Diagonal method.
DijkstraMethod Simplest heuristic to use with A*, essentially makes this algorithm equivalent to Dijkstra's
EuclideanMethod The Euclidean method determines the diagonal distance (a^2 + b^2)^(1/2) to the end node
ManhattanMethod The manhattan method involves treating the path as a city grid similar to how Manhattan is laid out.
MyMethod The Diagonal method.
 

Enum Summary
AstarFactory.Implementation Current implementations
